title: The Soviet Union: epic land
creator_credit: Novosti Press Agency, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Milan Herzog and Arnold Michaelis
brief_description: A survey of the Soviet Union revealing its immense size, diverse geographical features and great range of ethnic groups, from the Uzbeks in their agricultural setting to residents of the city of Moscow at their recreations. Songs and instrumental music native to the areas shown are heard throughout the film.
